price: Umuntu iyo atwawe n’agashavu, hari igihe yihutira kwisabira inabi, agasabira inabi n’abana hamwe n’amatungo vyiwe, nka kurya yisabira iciza, maze Imana Allah ku mpuhwe zayo, Igaheza Ikamwakirira gusa igisabisho yisabiramwo iciza, kuko burya umuntu yama yisabira inabi ku kwihuta no ku kutamenya.
arabic: وَيَدۡعُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ بِٱلشَّرِّ دُعَآءَهُۥ بِٱلۡخَيۡرِۖ وَكَانَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ عَجُولٗا

meta.transliteration: wayadʿu al-insānu bil-shari duʿāahu bil-khayri wakāna al-insānu ʿajūlan
